title: Analyze My Competitors
description: Paste competitor URLs to get insights and differentiation advice.
prompt_template: You are a brand strategist. Analyze the following competitor profiles. Extract their positioning, tone, and engagement style. Then summarize how the user can differentiate themselves.

title: Create 7-Day Content Plan
description: Get a personalized, actionable 7-day content calendar.
prompt_template: You are an expert social media strategist. Based on the user's objective, niche, and platform, generate a detailed 7-day content plan with suggested post types and captions.

title: Write Instagram Captions
description: Quickly generate engaging captions for your Instagram posts.
prompt_template: Write several Instagram captions for a post about {post_topic}. Match the tone: {tone_keywords}. Include a call to action: {call_to_action}.
